transcript:
Customer: Nimesh bol raha hun main.
Executive: Kaun sir?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan main Ma Tara Handi craft se baat kar raha hun.
Executive: Haan ji bataiye.
Customer: Saturday ko baat hua tha sir ye Monday ko phone call aayega jo kab batayega video call mein kya batayega.
Customer: Mera IndiaMART se to kuch kuch bhi nahi ho raha hai na kuch business na koi commitment kar raha hai to uska koi fulfill matlab mujhe kya karna hai abhi aise hi paisa paisa chala jaye.
Customer: Abhi to char panch mahina baki hai.
Executive: Ek second sir, ek second.
Customer: Kal Saturday ko aap conference call pe leke kiske sath baat karwaye the na?
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: To ji ko bola tha Monday ko call Monday ko call karna tha lekin abhi tak abhi tak Wednesday hai abhi tak call nahi kiya.
Executive: Ek second company name hai Ma Tara
Customer: Handi craft.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Ek second sir main le raha hun jara call pe inko.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Executive: Haan baat bhi kar liya.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan main ye keh raha hun sir, kaushik ji abhi line par hai.
Executive: Kaushik ji aapne us din bhi mere khyal se nahi wo kiya hai call. Aap abhi inka number likh lijiye, kaushik apna number batao.
Executive: 8318
Executive: Sir ye number likhiyega.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Haan 83
Customer: 18
Customer: 8318
Customer: Haan 8318
Customer: 17
Customer: 3080 sir.
Customer: 3080?
Executive: Ji 8318173080.
Customer: Haan kya karna hai?
Executive: Sir isse aap connect kijiyega main matlab that is baat hui thi aapki.
Customer: Aur abhi aap bataiye kab free hai sir aaj free hai abhi is time?
Customer: Abhi to 15 20 minute mein ho jayega.
Executive: 15 20 minute thoda sa time lagega sir aadhe ghante tak ka usme aapko samay dena padega.
Customer: To kitne time par login kar 9 baje hoga sir raat ko?
Executive: Sir raat mein 9 baje to office nahi hota hai matlab abhi ye tha ki 6 baje khatam ho jata hai lekin still hum log kuch cheeze ho nahi payi thi to abhi.
Customer: Nahi to fir kal kijiye na aapko to pehle bataya tha next day call karne ka uske baad aap Saturday ko bole Monday call karke puchenge.
Customer: Call to aata hi nahi hai na business aata hai kuch bhi nahi aata hai aap pura pura sirf commitment aata hai.
Executive: To aap mujhe bataiye sir aap kis time free honge Monday ka bhi aapne bola tha sir ki Monday ko aap available nahi rahenge.
Customer: To Monday to aap hi bola tha Monday aap subah call karke puch lenge aap kitne baje tak free rahenge wahi to baat hua tha call pe to aur bhi dusra log hai puchiye unse.
Executive: Ji to aap abhi mujhe bataiye is time abhi aap kar sakte hai to abhi aap online aa jayiye main karwa deta hun baat.
Customer: Kal call kijiye subah uske baad batayenge kal kitne baje free honge.
Executive: Kal 10 baje call karwa lun aapko sir?
Customer: Haan 10 baje call karne se fayda nahi hai aap 12 baje call kijiye to main bata paunga ki 1 2 baje login karne ke liye.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai main 12 baje ready karta hun. Aur sir aapko ye number call aayega ya mujhe call karna padega?
Executive: Nahi nahi main khud call karunga sir aapko aapko call nahi karna padega.
Executive: Haan aapke paas aa jayega sir baki number aapko de diya hai aapko agar kahin pe bhi kuch wo hota hai aap connect kar lijiyega.
Customer: Haan haan thik hai.
Executive: Hmm thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- No business or commitment fulfillment from IndiaMART.

- No call received on Monday as promised.

- Wants to know when the video call will happen.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the missed call.

- Shared Kaushik's number for direct contact.

- Agreed to call the customer at 12 PM next day.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer next day at 12 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, video call, commitment, follow up
